textSub.name: para1
textSub.string:
Another bonus stage! Each oyster still has exactly one pearl,
 but this time, it's a bit trickier. You have to eat all the pearls
 AND all the puffer fish before time runs out. Can you do it?

textSub.name: para2
textSub.string:
GREAT PROGRESS!
 You've come far since your minnow munching days! You
 just might have what it takes to defeat the SHARK KING!
